001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
005import java.util.List;
006
007/**
008 * Port responsible for reconstructing protocol messages from ordered TCP byte streams.
009 * <p>Implementations are stateful and generally single-threaded.</p>
010 *
011 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
012 */
013public interface MessageReconstructor {
014  /**
015   * Prepares the reconstructor for a new session.
016   *
017   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
018   */
019  void onStart();
020
021  /**
022   * Consumes a contiguous byte slice and emits zero or more protocol message events.
023   *
024   * @param slice byte stream slice with flow metadata
025   * @return ordered message events extracted from the slice; may be empty
026   * @throws Exception if parsing fails
027   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
028   */
029  List<MessageEvent> onBytes(ByteStream slice) throws Exception;
030
031  /**
032   * Releases resources at the end of the session.
033   *
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */
036  void onClose();
037}
